WorkItem.Description:
Navigation Item remove.

```
<mui:ModernWindow x:Class="Sample.WPF.Main.MainWindow"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        xmlns:mui="http://firstfloorsoftware.com/ModernUI"
        IsTitleVisible="True" WindowState="Maximized"          
        ContentSource="/Login.xaml">
```

How to remove "/Login.xaml" from navigation on above example..


Thanks for your help.
WorkItem.Summary: How to remove item from Navigation
